name: Benvira
slogan: Predictive Intelligence for a safer and more efficient future
description: Benvira is a company with proprietary ground-breaking algorithmic technology, which allows us to “see” future events, that might damage both living creatures or objects, before they happen.

jobs.title: CEO for Start-up
jobs.description:
Preferred criteria for candidates: 

•	Fluent in English and Spanish
•	Experience in a previous start-up in a leadership role as a founder or co-founder. 
•	Strong interpersonal and administration skills.
•	Entrepreneurial thinking and proven ability to innovate.
•	Budgetary management and forecast skills.
•	Ability to prioritize and coordinate. 
•	Talent to create a unifying, team-based and principle-driven mission and culture.
•	Availability to travel: the company is based in London but the candidate is expected to travel around Europe and Asia.

Key responsibilities and deliverables: 
•	Development and implementation of a strategic plan: 
o	Contributing to the creation of a well-defined overall strategy, including the setting of mid and long-term operational goals. 
o	Deploying and implementing scalable and efficient strategies to ensure both consistent results and exponential growth.
o	Monitoring and analysing of potential threats in the marketplace and taking the necessary strategic measures to avoid future dangers to the company.
•	Stakeholders management:
o	Periodically reporting the company’s development and performance to the Board of Directors, as well as proposing new courses of action to keep them informed, involved and engaged.
o	Actively looking for and facilitating new strategic partnerships for the company with a diversity of stakeholders.
•	Financial oversight:
o	Ensuring that the company’s financial resources are properly managed and reporting on its financial position.
•	Daily governance and risk management: 
o	Leading day-to-day operations.
o	Aligning people and budget resources against strategic business priorities.
o	Mitigating business, operational and governance risks.

We offer an annual salary of £30K, plus productivity bonuses and the possibility to enter an ESOP.
